greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of n-node Stanley graphs without isolated nodes.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..115
D. E. Knuth, Letter to Daniel Ullman and others, Apr 29 1997. [Annotated scanned copy, with permission]
formula: a(n) = Sum_{j=0..n} (-1)^j * C(n,j) * A135922(n-j). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 24 2019
a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} P(n-k, k, -1), where  P(n, k, x) = x*P(n, k-1, x) + 2^k*P(n-1, k, (x+1)/2). _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Mar 09 2020
mathematica: g[n_] := g[n] = Sum[b[n-j] Binomial[n, j] (-1)^j, {j, 0, n}];
a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[g[n-j] Binomial[n, j] (-1)^j, {j, 0, n}];
a /@ Range[0, 21] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 24 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
program: P(n, k, x):=if k<0 or n<0 then 0 else if k=0 then 1 else x*P(n, k-1, x)+
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 04 2019
ext: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 24 2019
